json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="notifications">
<prop type="array" name="customEmails">
<prop type="array" name="webhooks">
<prop type="array" name="profiles" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="days" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="hours" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="minutes" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="rules" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="dimensions">
<prop type="array" name="Values" required="True">

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

command.name: create

help.short: Gets or sets a list of key value pairs that describe the resource. These tags can be used in viewing and grouping this resource (across resource groups). A maximum of 15 tags can be provided for a resource. Each tag must have a key no greater in length than 128 characters and a value no greater in length than 256 characters.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.notifications" options="notifications" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.notifications[].email.customEmails" options="custom-emails">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.notifications[].webhooks" options="webhooks">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.profiles" options="profiles" required="True" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.profiles[].recurrence.schedule.days" options="days" required="True">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.profiles[].recurrence.schedule.hours" options="hours" required="True">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.profiles[].recurrence.schedule.minutes" options="minutes" required="True">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.profiles[].rules" options="rules" required="True">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.profiles[].rules[].metricTrigger.dimensions" options="dimensions">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.profiles[].rules[].metricTrigger.dimensions[].Values" options="values" required="True">

command.name: update

help.short: Gets or sets a list of key value pairs that describe the resource. These tags can be used in viewing and grouping this resource (across resource groups). A maximum of 15 tags can be provided for a resource. Each tag must have a key no greater in length than 128 characters and a value no greater in length than 256 characters.

command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.notifications" options="notifications" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.notifications[].email.customEmails" options="custom-emails">
